turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, Angrea want to order pizza from Bella Luna Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Two small, one with black olives and the other with tomato and broccoli.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, what type of crust would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you for asking. I would love thin crusts.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's just going to be for pick up and as soon as possible.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so your order is: 2 small thin crust pizzas. one with black olives, the other with tomato and broccoli, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they will be ready for pickup in 45 minutes.
